content: crochet snowflake video tutorial https //youtu be/hdfwjievf7k materials needed †3 25mm us d-3 crochet hook #2 fine yarn scissors notes †pattern will work with larger hook and yarn finished size- 2 5 stitches used chain- chain slip_stitch- slip_stitch single_crochet- single_crochet dc3tog- double_crochet 3 together dc4tog- double_crochet 4 together picot-3 pattern foundation ring- chain 4 slip_stitch into 1st chain round 1- chain 4 single_crochet into foundation ring *chain 3 single_crochet into foundation ring repeat from * 4 more times round 2- slip_stitch into chain-4 space chain 3 dc3tog chain 1 picot-3 three times slip_stitch into chain-1 in same chain-4 space chain 3 * dc4tog chain 1 picot-3 three times slip_stitch into chain-1 in next chain-3 space chain 3 repeat from * 4 more times slip_stitch into top of chain-3 fasten_off
